data.title: 1.1 stable iOS and HTML5 exports
data.body: Just downloaded 1.1 for testing. It is missing iOS export (I am on Mac). And the html5 export is broken (the generated html file seems to link to other missing files).

data.title: decimals() always return 4 when there are decimals
data.body:
The aim of this function is well to count the number of decimals after the point ?

``` GDScript
print(decimals(5)) # 0 ok
print(decimals(5.1)) # 4 ?
print(decimals(5.12)) # 4 ?
print(decimals(5.123)) # 4 maybe
print(decimals(5.1234)) # 4 ok
print(decimals(5.12345)) # 4 ?
```

data.title: Support high-resolution displays
data.body: Really miss the settings  Godot for high resolution screens. On the screen of my laptop interface Godot unbearably small. So impossible to work with.

data.title: Polygon2D + texture altas broken
data.body: The texture coordinates used by a Polygon2D seem to not be adjusted to work with the texture's new position in the atlas.  So Polygon2D's that use a texture that ends up in an atlas render with the wrong texture coordinates.

data.title: Add option for ColorPicker to show values in 0-1 range
data.body: If I want to hardcode colors and just use a colorpicker for reference, I need to divide the displayed values by 255. This is not a major issue but it would be nice if you could display color values in the 0-1 range directly ;)

data.title: Add input mapping GUI demo
data.body:
As promised :)

There is probably room for improvement, so feel free to comment and give ideas for doing things in a better way.

data.title: "Select all" is non-functional
data.body:
After selecting all in text editor ( both script and shader ) there is only a visual selection made. But copying, cuting or deleteding the selected text has no effect. It is for both - using "Edit->Select All" or Ctrl+A shortcut.
( Windows 7)

data.title: Fix for lose state on change parent with reparent method
data.body:
Recap from issues/requests:
https://github.com/okamstudio/godot/pull/1943
https://github.com/okamstudio/godot/issues/1905
http://www.godotengine.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=1117#p9336

Some nodes loses his state on remove_child / add_child on change parent
For example, on this demo which moves a node called traveler with animation/timer from left container to right one, and viceversa on move button, the animation cicles the text from 3,2,1, start, then loops a,b,c,d,e,f,g on a label. Timer loops a countdown of 10 seconds:

with:

> child.get_parent().remove_child(child)
> destination_node.add_child(child)
> https://gfycat.com/AmpleTotalChanticleer

As you can see, when the node parent changes, the animation receives the notification exit_tree() and stop the animation, and if autoplay of an animation is on, when the ready notification is received, resets the animation too.

with:

> child.reparent(destination_node)
> https://gfycat.com/SmartDeadDoctorfish

With the reparent, the state from the traveler doesn't change

The objetive of the reparent method is to move a node from one parent to another, without the loss of state on node or his childrens or the need of patch each children with gdscripts aimed only to change this behaviour, all implemented in a non-destructive way (add_child/remove_child, enter_tree/exit_tree, ready, works as always if you don't reparent)

the signature of reparent is:
node_to_change_parent.reparent(destination_node)

Reparent ignores only ready event and give the tools for know when the node is reparenting and take actions on event enter_tree/exit_tree from each type of node, so reparent vs remove_child/add_child method:
- The reparent only ignores the ready event
- Now exist a new method for query called "is_reparenting()", this one should be queried on enter_tree or exit_tree for skip/change behaviour on problematic nodes who loses his state on reparent.
- Two new notifications,NOTIFICATION_REPARENTING and NOTIFICATION_REPARENTED, those are called when the reparenting process start and ends, its like an exit/enter tree. This events set the bool of is_reparenting to true and false on node.cpp

For now we modified/check this node as an example with the enter_tree /exit_tree on reparenting behaviour using the is_reparenting() flag:
Animation Player

Also the demo from video for testing reparenting is added to demos/misc/reparent_tester with many features for debbuging issues and test if some another nodes lose state on reparent or if you want to see the issue on action change this lines:
![qu20zol 1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/12376042/7718312/82597700-fe7c-11e4-9542-4c25b4978ffa.png)
uncomment the two remove_child/add_child and comment reparent lines on main.gd and viceversa for move with reparent

We need some Help with the check and implement the behaviour of conserve state on another nodes with the demo, but the core for reparent is finished.

The behaviour of loss of state described here was a big issue on my shmup, which abuses of move bullets from a local node attached on the ships, to a global one. This with the aim of the burst of bullets follow the coordinates from the ship and when is finished moves to a global node, so the bullets doesn't follow the ship coordinates anymore. Without reparent the animations from the laser show the spawn animation again on mid air, same with timers or other strange behaviour.
On the next video is the shmup using reparent for local to global, where all is fixed, look at the behaviour of the laser:
https://gfycat.com/AnchoredMistyCoati

data.title: Dreaming of 1.2 user interface features
data.body:
Just put here some my ideas of how can 1.2 be (the ideas can be stupid in some way)
- add icon to .exe (i think time is come)
- open godot in fullscreen automaticly (or read last session position)
- tabs to fast scene to scene jumping (i know its in todo-list already)
- working in code and scene editor (or code and code) in one time (good for wide screens)
- when typing a path to a node it can be userfull to choose from a visual tree in popup window(for animation callFunc lines at first)
- reorder nodes just by mouse
- when creating new node itis toggle (do parent/do child(default)) of selected node
- hided and scripted icons of nodes will be in static vertical lines to better read
- in 3d fly mode with mouse look and wasd move
- preview game in scene editor not in new window, or save window pos

I hope it helps

data.title: Templates exports RC3 1.1 for Windows 32 release and debug completely broken! and HTML to.
data.body:
I checked on the windows 32 new templates to export RC3, 1.1. and the case is even worse than RC2 1.1 in this issue # 1868. there after export check "debug" work, but if you turn off and collect the EXE file after falling immediately after the logo.
BUT! In the new version, even EXE compiled in debug mode, after starting, just an empty gray window, and if a check mark off, shows the logo and immediately crashed again, well as for all HTML totally broken, and now he does not even create any files other than the date. pac, and again asserts that there are no templates out there where they actually are, and now that the two, as in the previous version said that the only release.

PS Besides, I also tried to specify the path to the templates by hand for each test and for Windows and HTML, but it gave the same results as in the first case. all the tests, I spent the last version of the project, 2D platformer and 3D platformer.

data.title: "ui_accept" InputEvent not working when code generated
data.body:
I'm trying to push some custom action events to use some default buttons behaviour. Since there was no problem about "ui_left/right/up/down/escape", I cant manage to make "ui_accept" work. This is the code I use:

```
var event = InputEvent()
event.type = InputEvent.ACTION
event.set_as_action( "ui_accept", true )
get_tree().input_event( event )
```

It seems to me that there is some bug that I cant find. Corrent me if I'm wrong.

data.title: Unexisting should be nonexistent
data.body: A lot of code errors use bad grammar and it's a bit confusing.

data.title: Wrong partition selected on Open File popups
data.body:
Opening some file for the first time opens current project's directory. It does it properly, but the drop down menu on the right has always selected a c:\ partition - even if the project's directory is on some other partition. If you want to go to c:\ partition then, you have to change the drop down menu twice: first select some random partition, and then c:. It happens becouse Godot won't let you select the already selected one.
Using Windows 7

data.title: No ../ when entering the folder without permissions to read
data.body:
After entering some folder with no permissions to read using Open File popup, there is no way to get back. The ../ folder does not appear in files tree. The only way is to enter the directory manualy then.
Using Windows 7

data.title: [feature request] - INI Support
data.body:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/INI_file

usage could be something like this:
var player = INI.set_file("user://player.ini")
# set_value(group,[field,value])

player.set_value("General",["name","Bob"])
# get_value(group,field)

player.get_name("General","name")

and the ini would look like
[General]
name=Bob

data.title: HTML5 template is not saving the writable partition user:// to the HTML5 storage, or anywhere else.
data.body:
HTML5 template is not saving the writable partition user:// to the HTML5 storage, or anywhere else.

See how at:
https://cs-263-emscripten.readthedocs.org/en/latest/files.html#persisting-data
http://diveintohtml5.info/storage.html
https://kripken.github.io/emscripten-site/docs/api_reference/Filesystem-API.html

Example at:
https://github.com/kripken/emscripten/blob/master/tests/fs/test_idbfs_sync.c

data.title: label wraps punctuation symbols individually
data.body:
If a label with line wrapping has punctuation like a period or a comma, it can end up being wrapped to the next line, so it looks like:

Curse your sudden but inevitable betrayal
!

If the exclamation point and the word "betrayal" can't fit on the line together, "betrayal" should be wrapped to the next line along with the exclamation point:

Curse your sudden but inevitable
betrayal!

data.title: RichTextLabel height zeroed, and Anchor settings reset, when inside a scroll container
data.body:
I am trying to display some formated text, shich should be scrolable. So there is a RichTextLabel (RTL) inside a ScrollContainer.
When the ScrollContainer is moved in the editor, the RTL height is reset to zero, and the anchor to (Begin,Begin,Begin,Begin)
When the RTL is sized (by dragging it's corner in the editor), If it becomes bigger than the text height, it resets to zero.

P.S. is it possible to fix this using a script? e.g.
richTextControl.parse_bbcode(textBB)
richTextControl. . . SetSize() or CalculateHeight   or similar?

data.title: Calculate gravity based on distance from body to gravity point
data.body:
This patch allows to scale the gravity applied by a gravity-point Area/Area2D based on the distance from the gravity-point to the body, thus simulating the basic law of gravitation.

The formula applied is:
gravity = area_gravity / (distance \* scale_factor + 1)^2
This ensures that the maximum gravity applied cannot be more then the user specified one (and avoid good old divisions by zero).
If scale factor is 0 (default) the usual system (no distance scale) is applied.

You can test the patch with the following demo:
https://github.com/Faless/godot_demo
Notice specifically the differences between demo 1 and 2 and demo 3 and 4

data.title: Expose AudioServer::free(RID rid) as AudioServer.free_rid(RID rid)
data.body:
To avoid script error due to collision with Object method free.

Calling AudioServer.free(rid) (eg. to delete a sample) currently cause the following error:
"Invalid call to function 'free' in base 'AudioServerSW'. Expected 0 arguments".

This patch creates expose the method to free a specific resource as AudioServer.free_rid(rid) as done for example in Physics2DServer and PhysicsServer

Also having in properties for PhysicBody could be handful too like "Free if out of viewport".
